text.debug_mode: Press D to enable debug mode
text.tutorial.welcome1: In this game you will find some
text.tutorial.welcome5: In this tutorial you will learn
text.tutorial.welcome7: If you want to skip it press SPACE.
text.tutorial.welcome8: If you want to see it press ENTER.
text.tutorial.walking_right: As first step try to walk.
text.tutorial.walking_right1: For this press the RIGHT button.
text.tutorial.walking_left: And now to the other direction.
text.tutorial.jump2: For this press the UP button.
text.tutorial.item: Now that you got the basics,
text.tutorial.item1: you should go to the npc.
text.tutorial.item2: Talk to him by pressing E.
text.tutorial.item6: So now go through the door
text.tutorial.item2.0: In front of you is the pedestal.
text.tutorial.item2.1: Go to it and press E.
